00010 
00015 double ibs_weifun(double x)
00016 {
00017    double chifun;       
00018    if(x < 1.0) 
00019      chifun=atan(sqrt((1.0-x)/x))/sqrt(x*(1.0-x));
00020    else  
00021      chifun=atanh(sqrt((x-1.0)/x))/sqrt(x*(x-1.0));
00022    return ((1.0+2.0*x)*chifun-3.0)/(1.0-x);
00023 }
00024 
00025 void ibs_rates_wei(double rates[], double rms_emittance_h, double rms_emittance_v, double rms_mom_spread,
00026                        double beta_h, double beta_v, double D, double current, double gamma0,
00027                        double beta0, double Z, double A)
00028   {     
00029    double rc=qe*qe/(4.0*PI*eps0*mp*clight*clight);
00030    double dconst=D*rms_mom_spread/sqrt(beta_h*rms_emittance_h+pow(D*rms_mom_spread,2));
00031    double aconst=beta_h*dconst/(D*gamma0);
00032    double bconst=aconst*sqrt(beta_v*rms_emittance_h/(rms_emittance_v*beta_h));
00033    double A0=2.0*sqrt(PI)/(32.0*PI*PI)*rc*rc*current*pow(Z,3)/
00034     (qe*A*A*rms_emittance_h*rms_emittance_v*rms_mom_spread*pow(gamma0*beta0,4));
00035    double coul_log=10.0;
00036    double nbeam=2.0;   // 2=unbunched 1=bunched
00037    double xx=(aconst*aconst+bconst*bconst)/2.0;
00038    double Ffunc=ibs_weifun(xx);
00039 
00040    double rate_l= 4.0*PI*A0*coul_log*Ffunc*nbeam*(1.0-dconst*dconst);
00041    double rate_h= 4.0*PI*A0*coul_log*Ffunc*(dconst*dconst-0.5*aconst*aconst);
00042    double rate_v= 4.0*PI*A0*coul_log*Ffunc*(-0.5*bconst*bconst);
00043    rates[0]=rate_l;
00044    rates[1]=rate_h;
00045    rates[2]=rate_v;
00046   }

00048 
00053 double plasma_long_diffusion(double rms_emittance, double rms_radius, double current, 
00054                              double gamma0,double beta0, double Z, double A)
00055 {
00056  double ri=qe*qe*Z*Z/(4.0*PI*eps0*A*mp*clight*clight);
00057  double coul_log=20.0;
00058  return sqrt(PI)*ri*ri*current*coul_log/(4.0*pow(beta0*gamma0,3)*beta0*qe*Z
00059         *rms_emittance*rms_radius);
00060 }
00061 
00062 
00063 double cooling_betaf(double dp, double rate0, double beta0, double veff)
00064 {
00065   double dp_eff=veff/(beta0*clight);
00066   return rate0; //*pow(dp_eff,3)/pow(dp_eff*dp_eff+dp*dp,1.5);
00067 }
